docs.snippet: Passion for soccer runs deep in New York City, where immigrants in every ethnic enclave are preparing to cheer on their home countries. Here are some city spots to watch with the faithful.
docs.lead_paragraph: Passion for soccer runs deep in New York City, where immigrants in every ethnic enclave are preparing to cheer on their home countries. Here are some city spots to watch with the faithful.
docs.abstract: New York City's varying groups of international soccer fans are being swept up in World Cup excitement, as are the bars whose big screen televisions are showing games; eight groups represented by eight different nations and their chosen hangout spots profiled.
